verses.verse: Then answered <WH6030> <WH8799> Eliphaz <WH464> the Temanite <WH8489>, and said <WH559> <WH8799>,
Should a wise man <WH2450> utter <WH6030> <WH8799> vain <WH7307> knowledge <WH1847>, and fill <WH4390> <WH8762> his belly <WH990> with the east wind <WH6921> ?
Should he reason <WH3198> <WH8687> with unprofitable <WH5532> <WH8799> talk <WH1697>? or with speeches <WH4405> wherewith he can do no good <WH3276> <WH8686> ?
Yea, thou castest off <WH6565> <WH8686> fear <WH3374>, and restrainest <WH1639> <WH8799> prayer <WH7881> before <WH6440> 'Elohim <WH410>.
For thy mouth <WH6310> uttereth <WH502> <WH8762> thine iniquity <WH5771>, and thou choosest <WH977> <WH8799> the tongue <WH3956> of the crafty <WH6175>.
Thine own mouth <WH6310> condemneth <WH7561> <WH8686> thee, and not I: yea, thine own lips <WH8193> testify <WH6030> <WH8799> against thee.
Art thou the first <WH7223> <WH8675> <WH7223> man <WH120> that was born <WH3205> <WH8735>? or wast thou made <WH2342> <WH8797> before <WH6440> the hills <WH1389> ?
Hast thou heard <WH8085> <WH8799> the secret <WH5475> of 'Elohim <WH433>? and dost thou restrain <WH1639> <WH8799> wisdom <WH2451> to thyself?
What knowest <WH3045> <WH8804> thou, that we know <WH3045> <WH8799> not? what understandest <WH995> <WH8799> thou, which is not in us?
With us are both the grayheaded <WH7867> <WH8802> and very aged <WH3453> men, much <WH3524> elder <WH3117> than thy father <WH1>.
Are the consolations <WH8575> of 'Elohim <WH410> small <WH4592> with thee? is there any secret <WH328> thing <WH1697> with thee?
Why doth thine heart <WH3820> carry thee away <WH3947> <WH8799>? and what do thy eyes <WH5869> wink at <WH7335> <WH8799>,
That thou turnest <WH7725> <WH8686> thy spirit <WH7307> against 'Elohim <WH410>, and lettest such words <WH4405> go out <WH3318> <WH8689> of thy mouth <WH6310> ?
What is man <WH582>, that he should be clean <WH2135> <WH8799>? and he which is born <WH3205> <WH8803> of a woman <WH802>, that he should be righteous <WH6663> <WH8799> ?
Behold, he putteth no trust <WH539> <WH8686> in his saints <WH6918>; yea, the heavens <WH8064> are not clean <WH2141> <WH8804> in his sight <WH5869>.
How much more abominable <WH8581> <WH8737> and filthy <WH444> <WH8737> is man <WH376>, which drinketh <WH8354> <WH8802> iniquity <WH5766> <WH8675> <WH5766> like water <WH4325> ?
I will shew <WH2331> <WH8762> thee, hear <WH8085> <WH8798> me; and that which I have seen <WH2372> <WH8804> I will declare <WH5608> <WH8762>;
Which wise <WH2450> men have told <WH5046> <WH8686> from their fathers <WH1>, and have not hid <WH3582> <WH8765> it:
Unto whom alone the earth <WH776> was given <WH5414> <WH8738>, and no stranger <WH2114> <WH8801> passed <WH5674> <WH8804> among <WH8432> them.
The wicked <WH7563> man travaileth <WH2342> <WH8711> with pain all his days <WH3117>, and the number <WH4557> of years <WH8141> is hidden <WH6845> <WH8738> to the oppressor <WH6184>.
A dreadful <WH6343> sound <WH6963> is in his ears <WH241>: in prosperity <WH7965> the destroyer <WH7703> <WH8802> shall come <WH935> <WH8799> upon him.
He believeth <WH539> <WH8686> not that he shall return <WH7725> <WH8800> out of darkness <WH2822>, and he is waited <WH6822> <WH8803> for of the sword <WH2719>.
He wandereth abroad <WH5074> <WH8802> for bread <WH3899>, saying, Where is it? he knoweth <WH3045> <WH8804> that the day <WH3117> of darkness <WH2822> is ready <WH3559> <WH8737> at his hand <WH3027>.
Trouble <WH6862> and anguish <WH4691> shall make him afraid <WH1204> <WH8762>; they shall prevail <WH8630> <WH8799> against him, as a king <WH4428> ready <WH6264> to the battle <WH3593>.
For he stretcheth out <WH5186> <WH8804> his hand <WH3027> against 'Elohim <WH410>, and strengtheneth <WH1396> <WH8691> himself against 'El SHaddai <WH7706>.
He runneth <WH7323> <WH8799> upon him, even on his neck <WH6677>, upon the thick <WH5672> bosses <WH1354> of his bucklers <WH4043>:
Because he covereth <WH3680> <WH8765> his face <WH6440> with his fatness <WH2459>, and maketh <WH6213> <WH8799> collops of fat <WH6371> on his flanks <WH3689>.

And he dwelleth <WH7931> <WH8799> in desolate <WH3582> <WH8737> cities <WH5892>, and in houses <WH1004> which no man inhabiteth <WH3427> <WH8799>, which are ready <WH6257> <WH8694> to become heaps <WH1530>.

He shall not be rich <WH6238> <WH8799>, neither shall his substance <WH2428> continue <WH6965> <WH8799>, neither shall he prolong <WH5186> <WH8799> the perfection <WH4512> thereof upon the earth <WH776>.

He shall not depart <WH5493> <WH8799> out of darkness <WH2822>; the flame <WH7957> shall dry up <WH3001> <WH8762> his branches <WH3127>, and by the breath <WH7307> of his mouth <WH6310> shall he go away <WH5493> <WH8799>.
Let not him that is deceived <WH8582> <WH8738> trust <WH539> <WH8686> in vanity <WH7723>: for vanity <WH7723> shall be his recompence <WH8545>.
It shall be accomplished <WH4390> <WH8735> before <WH3808> his time <WH3117>, and his branch <WH3712> shall not be green <WH7488>.
He shall shake off <WH2554> <WH8799> his unripe grape <WH1154> as the vine <WH1612>, and shall cast off <WH7993> <WH8686> his flower <WH5328> as the olive <WH2132>.
For the congregation <WH5712> of hypocrites <WH2611> shall be desolate <WH1565>, and fire <WH784> shall consume <WH398> <WH8804> the tabernacles <WH168> of bribery <WH7810>.
They conceive <WH2029> <WH8800> mischief <WH5999>, and bring forth <WH3205> <WH8800> vanity <WH205>, and their belly <WH990> prepareth <WH3559> <WH8686> deceit <WH4820>.
